content.raw:
The Box class is axis-aligned, but it might be useful to define boxes which aren't. For example, right now I'd like to use such a box to check if it contains a 3D point.

It looks like such a thing is not very common. Eigen for example only offers an [`AlignedBox`](https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox/classEigen_1_1AlignedBox.html). 

A few implementation options I can think of:

1. Add a pose to the current box class, which entails taking the pose into account in several of its methods.
2. Add methods to the current Box class which accept a pose, and only those methods do pose-related calculations
3. Create a new class which has pose.
